comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: This was designed by James Barnet to be the main façade, and because of the slope of the land there is an extra floor. The proportions of the building are much more pleasing here than the Macquarie Street aspect in the next photo, which appears relatively dumpy. Another similar view without the vegetation - en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Garden_Palace_Sydney_1879.jpg
